item.title: How to write Publisher and Subscriber in one Node with ROS
item.description: ROS(Robot Operating System) ROS is a middleware that provides libraries and tools to support the creation of robot applications. It enables easy communication between robots. Pub & Sub communication In ROS, an executable that is connected to the ROS network is called a “Node”, and messages are exchanged between nodes using “Topics”. The node that publishes messages is called a “Publisher” and the node that receives messages is called a “Subscriber”.
